help_message:
🤖 **Habit Tracker Bot - Help**

**Main Commands:**
• `/start` - Start using the bot
• `/add_habit` - Add a new habit
• `/check_in` - Mark habit as completed
• `/progress` - View your progress
• `/delete_habit` - Delete a habit
• `/language` - Change language
• `/help` - Show this help

**How to use:**
1. Add a habit with `/add_habit`
2. Mark daily completion with `/check_in`
3. Track progress with `/progress`

**Habit Frequencies:**
• Daily - every day
• Weekly - once a week
• 3 times a week - three times per week

**Motivation:**
You'll get a motivational quote with each check-in!

**Admin Commands:**
• `/stats` - Comprehensive bot statistics
• `/ban` - User management with ban functionality
• `/broadcast` - Message broadcasting to all users

💪 Good luck building healthy habits!
